tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  energy_source VARCHAR(50),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    reading_date DATE,
    consumption DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_building FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);
